name: Joshua T. Vogelstein
content: jovo Joshua (jovo) T. Vogelstein, I forge flourishing codes. 2009: PhD in Neuroscience and MSE in Applied Mathematics and Statistics from Johns Hopkins University 2011: Co-founded Open Connectome Project, absorbed by Applied Physics Lab in 2020 2015: Co-developed ML method which is Google's default tabular ML method since 2023 2018: Co-founded Gigantum, big data cloud platform, bought by Nvidia, 2022 2019: Co-developed graph machine learning library with Microsoft Research 2020: Co-author SOTA continual learning algorithm, advances it at Collas '22, Neurips '24, and AGI '25 2023: Co-senior author on first brain connectome ever published in Science, NatGeo top medical breakthrough of the year 2025: Co-authored monograph on graph machine learning, published by Cambridge University Press 2025: Co-authored first transcoded neural network algorithm in AGI, 100,000x more efficient than transformer now: stealth startup Associate Professor of Biomedical Engineering at Johns Hopkins University Founding Director of the NeuroData lab since 2014 The important stuff: 1983: fell in love with the love of my life 2014: married the love of my life 2017: Lion born 2019: Owl born 2022: Hawk born Sacred Son LT1, CLG Certified 15 Commitments Coach. For more info: , , , , , , , , , , or .
